Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Crap \Crap\ (kr[a^]p), n. 1. In the game of craps, a first throw of the dice in which the total is two, three, or twelve, in which case the caster loses. Also called {craps}. [Webster 1913 Suppl. +PJC]
2. same as {excrement} and {feces}. [vulgar]
Syn: shit. [PJC]
3. nonsense; balderdash; bullshit; -- also used as an expletive. [vulgar]
Syn: bullshit. [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Craps \Craps\ (kr[a^]ps), n. A gambling game with dice. It is one of the more popular games in casinos. [Local, U.S.] [1913 Webster +PJC]

craps n 1: when two dice are thrown and both come up showing one spot the results is called `craps' or `snake eyes' [syn: {snake eyes}] 2: a gambling game using two dice [syn: {crap shooting}, {crapshoot}, {crap game}]
